module.name: Do-Not-Disturb (DND)
module.changelog: *13.0.3.2* Packaging of ver 13.0.3.2 *13.0.3.1* FREEPBX-14964 set dnd off mode to unavailable *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9564 UCP goes offline after changing settings *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visuals *12.0.3* UCP work and work for PJSIP hints *12.0.2* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.1* UCP Module Addition *2.11.0.3* Include license file *2.11.0.2* Fix typo that was causing incorrect devstate to be set. *2.11.0.1* #6857 related *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4758 *2.9.0.0* #4651
module.description: Do not disturb (DND) allows calls to be rejected at the user's request via a feature code, UCP setting, or REST App.
